snippet: The body of a Chicago-area woman has been found stuffed into a suitcase on Bali, and her daughter and the daughter’s boyfriend are being held in her death.
abstract: Body of Chicago-area woman Sheila von Wiese-Mack is found stuffed into suitcase on Bali, where she was vacationing, and her daughter Heather Louise Mack and daughter’s boyfriend Tommy Schaefer are being held in her death.
lead_paragraph: The body of a Chicago-area woman has been found stuffed into a suitcase on Bali, and her daughter and the daughter’s boyfriend are being held in her death.
